document.full_text: more than 1,000 environmental activists, religious workers, organizers and rural workers have been murdered in the amazon in the last 20 years, but successful prosecutions of those who order the killings are virtually nonexistent, according to watchdog groups.
document.title: brazil vows to confront amazon violence
lines_and_colors: more than 1,000 environmental activists, religious workers, organizers and rural workers have been murdered in the amazon in the last 20 years, but successful prosecutions of those who order the killings are virtually nonexistent, according to watchdog groups.
